mapper.select: SELECT ar.id, ar.resource_name, ar.url, ar.parent_id, ar.is_del, ar.resource_type, ar.resource_code FROM djmall_auth_user_role aur LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_role_resource arr ON aur.role_id = arr.role_id LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_resource ar ON arr.resource_id = ar.id WHERE aur.user_id = #{userId}
